resources.string: Make sure you have an active Internet connection.
In 2014 the conference will take place in the beautiful Moscone Center in San Francisco, CA U.S.A.

Located in the heart of SOMA in San Francisco, Moscone Center features more than 992,000 square feet of meeting and exhibit space, including 107 meeting rooms, three ballrooms and over 151,000 square feet of pre-function lobbies.
